citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:06 PM on
7/8/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and speaking to a facility
representative who stated no one was available for an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:06 PM on 
7/8/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and speaking to a facility 
representative who stated no one was available for an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and 
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
End Section
